document_data.name: ''Heartwood''
document_data.mainbody: en installed in a [[warforged]], ''heartwood'' spread green mossy growth across their body.
document_data.Description: When installed in a [[warforged]], ''heartwood'' spread green mossy growth across their body.
document_data.Powers: The living wood greatly enhanced the protective and regenerative properties of a warforged's form while it was used.
document_data.History: ''Heartwood'' was found in the treasure pile of the [[red dragon]] [[Daeronnax]], the master of [[Clan Daeronnax]] in the [[Stonelands]] after he kidnapped the adventurer [[Tristran of Daggerford]].
